responsibilities: Supporting the R&D Reliability team by developing data engineering tools and support R&D with improvements
Leading or supporting project teams as needed
Supporting CONQ database transition and improvements
Migrating data and writing new scripts to allow the transducer reliability team to have the data they need consistently
skills: Experience with T-SQL, Python, SAP, Microsoft Power Apps, SAP-ME
Problem-solving methodology (i.e., Shainin Red-X, DMAIC, PDCA)
Experience with a regulated work environment
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on supporting the R Reliability team through data engineering, conducting data analysis, and leading or supporting project teams. The tasks include database transition, data migration, and script writing to ensure data consistency. The skills required include experience with T-SQL, Python, SAP, Microsoft Power Apps, and SAP-ME, along with knowledge of Object Oriented Programming and problem-solving methodologies. There is no mention of Generative AI, language models, or any specific tasks related to developing or working with GenAI or LLMs. The focus is primarily on data engineering, analysis, and project management within a regulated manufacturing environment.
